examples.example: 我用一百块钱买了一本非常有意义的书，收获了很多知识。

translate.english: I used one hundred yuan to buy a very meaningful book and gained a lot of knowledge.

examples.example: 我用一百块给妈妈买了一束漂亮的鲜花，她特别开心。

translate.english: I used one hundred yuan to buy a beautiful bouquet of flowers for my mother, and she was extremely happy.

examples.example: 我用一百块给贫困山区的孩子买了一些文具，看到他们开心的笑容我也觉得很快乐。

translate.english: I used one hundred yuan to buy some stationery for the children in the poor mountainous areas, and seeing their happy smiles, I also felt very happy.
